statements: SELECT user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM user_payment_history WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM user_payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM user_payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM user_payment_history ORDER BY payment_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM user_payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC, payment_amount ASC
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM user_payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS num_payments FROM user_payment_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_payments > 3
SELECT user_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM user_payment_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM user_payment_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_payment < 50
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date, user_id FROM user_payments
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM user_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM user_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM user_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT analysis_result, analysis_date FROM payment_analysis
SELECT * FROM user_payments WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_amount FROM user_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM user_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT p.user_id, p.payment_amount, a.analysis_result FROM user_payments p INNER JOIN payment_analysis a ON p.user_id = a.user_id

SELECT p.user_id, AVG(p.payment_amount) AS avg_payment, COUNT(a.analysis_result) AS analysis_count FROM user_payments p LEFT JOIN payment_analysis a ON p.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY p.user_id HAVING avg_payment > 1000 ORDER BY analysis_count DESC
SELECT * FROM UserPaymentHistory;
SELECT user_id, amount, payment_date FROM UserPaymentHistory;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserInformation ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, payment_method, card_number, expiry_date FROM PaymentMethods WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM UserPaymentHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPaymentHistory WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserInformation WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT user_id, payment_date, amount FROM UserPaymentHistory WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM UserPaymentHistory WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, payment_method, card_number FROM PaymentMethods WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_history WHERE user_id = 3 AND method_id = 2;

SELECT users.user_name, payments.amount, payment_history.payment_date FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id JOIN payment_history ON payments.payment_id = payment_history.payment_id WHERE users.user_name LIKE '%e%' OR payments.amount < 50 ORDER BY users.user_name ASC, payments.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT method_name FROM payment_methods WHERE method_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT user_id, analysis_result FROM reporting_data WHERE report_generated_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 500
SELECT user_name, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT user_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM user_accounts JOIN payments ON user_accounts.user_id = payments.user_id
SELECT user_name, payment_status, payment_timestamp FROM user_accounts JOIN user_payment_history ON user_accounts.user_id = user_payment_history.user_id
